quiz.title: Python Programming Basics
quiz.description: Test your knowledge of Python syntax, data structures, and core concepts

questions.text: Which of the following is the correct way to create a list in Python?
What is the output of: print(type([]))?
Which keyword is used to define a function in Python?
What is the correct way to create a dictionary in Python?
Which method is used to add an item to the end of a list?
What is the output of: print(3 ** 2)?
Which of the following is used for comments in Python?
What is the correct way to check if a key exists in a dictionary?
Which loop is used to iterate over a sequence in Python?
What is the output of: print(len('Hello'))?
